item.title: ChatMessage method?

You mean like trivia? When someone answers right he gets X amount of cash.
[/quote]
Yes. Server displays a message to a player and if player just writes correct word and presses enter(just like chatting normally) he will get prize.[/quote]
org.rscdaemon.server.model.Player

public void addMessageToChatQueue(byte[] messageData) {

You could make something out of that.

item.title: ChatMessage method?
item.dc:creator: @inTouch inTouch
item.description:
@inTouch wrote:

How to make it so that server script retrieves what player says(just writing and pressing enter) and uses it for example a simple wordgame?

For example, I’d like to make something like:
if (whatplayerjustsaid == rightword) {
giveplayer1000gp;
}

I found out the methods that are related to it are located in ChatMessage.java but I haven’t figured out how to use them and I’m still learning.

Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
